mapper.insert:
select SEQ_ASYN_NOTICE_INFO.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into ASYN_NOTICE_INFO (ID, CONTENT, SEND_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, SEND_TIME, BIZ_NO) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ASYN_NOTICE_INFO set CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_STATUS = #{sendStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BIZ_NO = #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, CONTENT, SEND_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, SEND_TIME, BIZ_NO from ASYN_NOTICE_INFO
